page.title: 06CHILDREN'S GAMES(GIRLS)
page.content: HERE ARE SOME GAMES THAT GIRLS OFTEN PLAY.MANY ARE VERY OLD AND HAVE BEEN HANDED DOWN FOR HUNDREDS OF YEARS:- TWO-BALLER FRENCH ROUNDERS DOWN IN THE VALLEY(SINGING GAME) SKIPPING HOPSCOTCH BOTH GIRLS AND BOYS CAN PLAY THE NEXT GAMES:- HIDE AND SEEK MARBLES CONKERS ROUNDERS TIGGY(CHASEY) {TWO-BALLER:-}IN THIS GAME A GIRL JUGGLES WITH TWO HANDBALLS,SOMETIMES ONTO A WALL,SOMETIMES INTO THE AIR.SONGS ARE SUNG AS DIFFERENT MOVEMENTS ARE MADE.{ {HOPSCOTCH:-}THIS IS PLAYED ON A GRID OF 10 NUMBERS.IN TURN,SOMEONE THROWS A STONE ONTO A NUMBER THEN HOPS AND JUMPS TO THAT NUMBER,PICKS UP THE STONE AND RETURNS TO THE START TO THROW AGAIN.IF A NUMBER IS MISSED THE NEXT PERSON TAKES A TURN.
